Injured on 6/19/1972 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Earned first career win on 9/25/1972...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1977, going 3-0, 0.31...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/3/1978 to a 2-year deal worth $1,234,567 per year...
Injured on 9/29/1978 with a Strained Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/6/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/8/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
Released by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1983...
